# Timetable Management System - Release

## ğŸ“± Download

Choose the appropriate file for your device:

### Android APK Files
- **ARM64-v8a (Recommended)** - For most modern Android devices (2018+)
  - Download: `timetable-app-arm64-v8a-vX.X.X.apk`
  - Size: ~25-30 MB
  
- **ARMv7** - For older 32-bit Android devices
  - Download: `timetable-app-armeabi-v7a-vX.X.X.apk`
  - Size: ~25-30 MB
  
- **x86_64** - For Android emulators and x86 devices
  - Download: `timetable-app-x86_64-vX.X.X.apk`
  - Size: ~30-35 MB

### Google Play Store
- **App Bundle (AAB)** - For publishing to Google Play Store
  - File: `timetable-app-vX.X.X.aab`
